author: Staff Reporter
text:
The grottos in three churches were allegedly vandalised by antisocial elements in Palavilai village under Kollencode police limits in Kanyakumari district on Wednesday night.

According to police, the vandalised grottos situated in front of the churches were noticed Thursday morning by local people. The grottos in Infant Jesus Church in Santhanapalli, St. Xavier Church and St. George Orthodox Church, all situated within a distance of 250 metres, were found broken along with the statues of Jesus and Mother Mary.

Kollencode police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Grottos in 3 churches vandalised
